DataElement.preferredName: Notification Performed Study Activity Delay Duration ISO21090.PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The completed activity within the context of a given study that represents the communication of a message to a recipient. The period of time that an action is delayed relative to an original schedule. EXAMPLE(S): If a substance administration is delayed 2 days as a result of an adverse event, then the delayDuration is 2 days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Notification Performed Study Activity Delay Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Informing by words.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.:The period of time during which something continues.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Informing by words.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.
The period of time during which something continues.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains PQ to have units that describe a period of time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
